game.name: Total War: SHOGUN 2 - Rise of the Samurai Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Rise of The Samurai is a brand new, independent campaign for Total War: SHOGUN 2 set 400 years before the dramatic civil war depicted in SHOGUN 2.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rise of The Samurai is a brand new, independent campaign for Total War: SHOGUN 2 set 400 years before the dramatic civil war depicted in SHOGUN 2.
game.developers: The Creative Assembly, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
